文.definition: language; culture; writing; formal; literary; gentle; (old) classifier for coins; Kangxi radical 67

文不加點.definition: to write a flawless essay in one go (idiom); to be quick-witted and skilled at writing compositions

文人相輕.definition: scholars tend to disparage one another (idiom)

文以載道.definition: words of truth; moral expressed in words; written article explaining a moral

文具.definition: stationery; item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)

文創.definition: (Tw) blending of cultural heritage elements with creative modern designs to produce innovative products and services (often used attributively, as in 文創商品|文创商品[wen2chuang4 shang1pin3]) (abbr. for 文化創意|文化创意[wen2hua4 chuang4yi4])

文創商品.definition: product that incorporates traditional culture or local elements with innovative design ideas

文創產業.definition: creative industries (design, music, publishing etc) (abbr. for 文化創意產業|文化创意产业[wen2 hua4 chuang4 yi4 chan3 ye4])

文化.definition: culture; civilization; cultural; CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]

文化和旅遊部.pinyin: Wen2 hua4 he2 Lu:3 you2 bu4

文在寅.definition: Moon Jae-in (1953-), Korean politician and human rights lawyer, president of Korea from 2017

文天祥.definition: Wen Tianxiang (1236-1283), Song dynasty politician and poet, folk hero in resisting Mongol invasion in Jiangxi in 1275

文如其人.definition: the writing style mirrors the writer (idiom)

文字.definition: character; script; writing; written language; writing style; phraseology; CL:個|个[ge4]

文字獄.definition: literary inquisition; official persecution of intellectuals for their writing

文學士.definition: Bachelor of Arts; B.A.; BA; A.B.; Artium Baccalaureus

文摘.definition: digest (of literature); to make a digest (of data); summary

文種.definition: Wen Zhong (-467 BC), adviser to the state of Yue during Spring and Autumn period

文章.definition: article; essay; literary works; writings; hidden meaning; CL:篇[pian1],段[duan4],頁|页[ye4]

文職.definition: civilian post (as opposed to military); civil service; administration

文藝兵.definition: PLA military personnel who specialize in literary or artistic pursuits

文號.definition: document identifier code (typically including an abbreviation for the name of the issuing organization, the date and a serial number)

文讀.definition: literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character

文豪.definition: literary giant; great writer; eminent writer

文責自負.definition: the author takes sole responsibility for the views expressed here (disclaimer)

文辭.definition: language; use of words; phraseology; articles; essays; writing

文過飾非.definition: (idiom) to cover up one's faults; to whitewash

文部.definition: Wenbu or Ombu village in Nyima county 尼瑪縣|尼玛县[Ni2 ma3 xian4], Nagchu prefecture, central Tibet; Tang dynasty equivalent of 吏部, personnel office

文采.definition: literary talent; literary grace; rich and bright colors

文錦渡.definition: Man Kam To (place in Hong Kong)

文青.definition: young person who adopts an outwardly artistic or intellectual style (abbr. for 文藝青年|文艺青年[wen2 yi4 qing1 nian2])

文靜.definition: (of a person's manner or character) gentle and quiet

文面.definition: to tattoo the face; face tattoo; to brand (ancient punishment)

文革.definition: Cultural Revolution (1966-76) (abbr. for 文化大革命[Wen2 hua4 Da4 ge2 ming4])

文風.definition: writing style; (used with 鼎盛[ding3 sheng4]) cultural activity

文風不動.definition: absolutely still; fig. not the slightest change; also written 紋風不動|纹风不动

文飾.definition: to polish a text; rhetoric; ornate language; to use florid language to conceal errors; to gloss over

文體.definition: genre of writing; literary form; style; literary recreation and sporting activities
